title: How to Make Sbiten

steps.headline: Bring 10 1/4 cups of water to a boil.
Add the ginger, nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon, honey and homemade blackberry jam and stir gently.
Turn the heat down to about medium-low and bring it to a simmer.
steps.description: Stir the mixture for 6 minutes then take the pot off the stove.

steps.headline: Let cool for 2 minutes.
steps.description: Afterward, ladle the hot beverage into 10 mugs.

steps.headline: Garnish with a homemade mint leaf candy and enjoy!
Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium heat.
steps.description: Whisk occasionally. Mixture will be slightly foamy.

steps.headline: Serve in small glasses with a cinnamon stick for garnish.
Bring the water to a boil in a pot.
